instruction: Generate a persuasive argument for a new school policy.
output: Implementing a new school policy will have a positive impact on the education of our students. It will allow us to provide a better learning environment, with access to more resources and activities for students. It will also help to create a sense of responsibility and accountability among both students and teachers, fostering an atmosphere of trust and respect. By introducing a new school policy, we can ensure that our students receive the education they deserve.
